parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the cluster. For cloud services, set this parameter to `cloud-product-prometheus`.

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: The length of the cluster ID. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Product
parameters.description: The name of the cloud service. This parameter is required if you set ClusterType to `cloud-product-prometheus`. Valid values: influxdb, mongodb, and DLA. You cannot specify multiple service names.

parameters.name: RecreateSwitch
parameters.description: Specifies whether to create or query a virtual cluster. This parameter provides backward compatibility.
